price: Ṣẹ́rí kúrò ní ọ̀dọ̀ wọn. Ní ọjọ́ tí olùpèpè yóò pèpè fún kiní kan tí ẹ̀mí kórira (ìyẹn, Àjíǹde),
arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fatawalla ʿanhum yawma yadʿu al-dāʿi ilā shayin nukurin
